articles.content: WASHINGTON Virtual school is fostering isolation in children and stress in parents, according to a new study from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. The findings confirm previous researc… [+6345 chars]

articles.author: Lisa M. Krieger
articles.title: Another case of South African COVID-19 variant found in Santa Clara County - The Mercury News
articles.description: The worrisome South African strain of the COVID-19 virus, which appears to be more contagious and more resistant to some vaccines, has once again surfaced in Santa Clara County.
articles.content:
The worrisome South African strain of the COVID-19 virus, which appears to be more contagious and more resistant to some vaccines, has once again surfaced in Santa Clara County.
